name: Zombie Dad
author: Kim Dae-hoon &#40김대훈&#41
content: A world overrun by zombies, and 100 chances for Ryu Min-Seok to save his daughter. But just when he&#039s about to fail for the 100th time, he comes back to life?! The zombie apocalypse survival story of a father who awakens as a zombie to protect his daughter!
